name: Jammed (Last Minute Studios)
description:
JAMMED

A Submission to Kenney Game Jam 2021 from Last Minute Studios

Aliens are invading! Shoot them (Left Mouse Button) and defend yourself. The twist? Your motors are jammed and you can only turn right (Space Bar)! Play strategically and try to keep up with the growing alien invasion to see how long you can survive! Can you win a gold medal?

Known Bugs / Problems:

- There are no explosions when enemies are destroyed

- The difficulty curve is insane. You die very quickly around the 80 point mark and the only known way to get a gold medal is to use an auto-clicker. Additionally, it is also too easy in the early game, and even while AFK you are likely to get a bronze medal.

Check out our previous game jam submissions here: https://ericli3690.itch.io/
